case_title: FAZAL ILAHI vs Malik MUZAFFAR HUSSAIN

judgment_summary.appellant_position: Teacher at Government High School, Kakrali, District Gujrat
judgment_summary.challenge: Order of transfer to Government High School, Kohar
key_points: Appellant subjected to six transfers in one calendar year.
Transferred from Baluchistan to Punjab on own request.
Posted at Government Middle School, Langhrial, then transferred to Government High School, Kakrali.
Three transfer orders issued: Mona Depot, Sohawa Bulani, Kohar.
Transfers to Mona Depot and Sohawa Bulani canceled; Kohar transfer remains in force.
judgment_summary.reason_for_transfer: Complaints of indulging in local politics in Kakrali, appellant's home village.
judgment_summary.distance: Kohar is 40 miles away from Kakrali.
judgment_summary.tribunal_decision: No extraordinary circumstances warranting interference with transfer order.
